title: Sean Penn’s Labor Awakening
sub_head: The actor runs afoul of the Biden National Labor Relations Board.
body:
Sean Penn is well known as a man of the left, but allow us to rise in his defense. The Biden National Labor Relations Board seems to be unfairly targeting the Hollywood admirer of Hugo Chavez for exercising his First Amendment speech rights.
Last week the labor board issued a formal complaint against Mr. Penn for allegedly threatening employees of his disaster relief nonprofit, Community Organized Relief Effort (CORE). Here’s what happened. The New York Times in January ran a positive story about a Los Angeles mass vaccination site where his nonprofit assisted.
